Profile_Add_placeholder: Add specific instructions for how you want the AI to behave during
Profile_Personalize: Personalize the AI's behavior with specific instructions that will be added to the
Language_Message: Language for navigation throughout the application, IF YOU NEED TO RESET THIS OPTION
LangIA_Language: Language for speech recognition and AI responses
Layout_Smaller: Smaller window size with reduced padding and font sizes for minimal screen footprint
Layout_Standard: Standard layout with comfortable spacing and font sizes
Layout_Adjust: Adjust the transparency of the interface background elements
Layout_AdjustFont: Adjust the font size of AI response text in the assistant view
Screen_Screenshots: Screenshots will only be taken when you use the 'Ask Next Step' shortcut
Screen_Automatic: Automatic screenshots will be taken at the specified interval
Keyboard_Restore: Restore all keyboard shortcuts to their default values
Google_Allow: Allow the AI to search Google for up-to-date information and facts during conversations
Google_Changes: Changes take effect when starting a new AI session
Message_Impotant: üí° Settings are automatically saved as you change them. Changes will take effect immediately or on the next session start.
Advanced_Unlock: Unlock experimental features, developer tools, and advanced configuration options
Advanced_Advanced_mode: Advanced mode adds a new icon to the main navigation bar
getKeybind_Ask_Next_Step_Message: Take screenshot and ask AI for the next step suggestion
getKeybind_Previous_Response_Message: Navigate to the previous AI response
getKeybind_Next_Response_Message: Navigate to the next AI response
getKeybind_Scroll_Response_Up_Message: Scroll the AI response content up
getKeybind_Scroll_Response_Down_Message: Scroll the AI response content down
